verses.verse: Then <S%H1085>Bildad<s%> the <S%H7747>Shuhite<s%> <S%H6030>responded,<s%> <S%H559><s%>
<S%H575>"How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you <S%H7760>hunt<s%> <S%H7078><s%> for <S%H4405>words<s%>? <S%H995>Show<s%> <S%H995>understanding<s%> and <S%H310>then<s%> we can <S%H1696>talk.<s%>
<S%H4069>"Why<s%> are we <S%H2803>regarded<s%> as <S%H929>beasts,<s%> As <S%H2933>stupid<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>?

"O you who <S%H2963>tear<s%> <S%H5315>yourself<s%> in your <S%H639>anger<s%> â€“ For your <S%H4616>sake<s%> is the <S%H776>earth<s%> to be <S%H5800>abandoned,<s%> Or the <S%H6697>rock<s%> to be <S%H6275>moved<s%> from its <S%H4725>place<s%>?
<S%H1571>"Indeed,<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1846>goes<s%> out, And the <S%H7632>flame<s%> of his <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H5050>gives<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5050>light.<s%>
"The <S%H216>light<s%> in his <S%H168>tent<s%> is <S%H2821>darkened,<s%> And his <S%H5216>lamp<s%> <S%H1846>goes<s%> out <S%H5921>above<s%> him.
"His <S%H202>vigorous<s%> <S%H6806>stride<s%> is <S%H9503>shortened,<s%> And his own <S%H6098>scheme<s%> <S%H7993>brings<s%> him <S%H7993>down.<s%>
"For he is <S%H7971>thrown<s%> into the <S%H7568>net<s%> by his own <S%H7272>feet,<s%> And he <S%H1980>steps<s%> on the <S%H7639>webbing.<s%>
"A <S%H6341>snare<s%> <S%H270>seizes<s%> [him] by the <S%H6119>heel,<s%> [And] a <S%H6782>trap<s%> <S%H2388>snaps<s%> <S%H2388>shut<s%> on him.
"A <S%H9112>noose<s%> for him is <S%H2934>hidden<s%> in the <S%H776>ground,<s%> And a <S%H4434>trap<s%> for him on the <S%H5410>path.<s%>
<S%H5439>"All<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H1091>terrors<s%> <S%H1204>frighten<s%> him, And <S%H6327>harry<s%> him at every <S%H7272>step.<s%>
"His <S%H202>strength<s%> is <S%H7457>famished,<s%> And <S%H343>calamity<s%> is <S%H3559>ready<s%> at his <S%H6763>side.<s%>
"His <S%H5785>skin<s%> is <S%H398>devoured<s%> by <S%H905>disease,<s%> The first-born of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H398>devours<s%> his <S%H905>limbs.<s%>
"He is <S%H5423>torn<s%> from the <S%H4009>security<s%> of his <S%H168>tent,<s%> And they <S%H6805>march<s%> him before the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1091>terrors.<s%>
"There <S%H7931>dwells<s%> in his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H1097>nothing<s%> of his; <S%H1614>Brimstone<s%> is <S%H2219>scattered<s%> on his <S%H5116>habitation.<s%>
"His <S%H8328>roots<s%> are <S%H3001>dried<s%> <S%H4480>below,<s%> <S%H8478><s%> And his <S%H9524>branch<s%> is <S%H9268>cut<s%> <S%H9268>off<s%> <S%H4480>above.<s%> <S%H4605><s%>
<S%H2143>"Memory<s%> of him perishes from the <S%H6>earth,<s%> And he has <S%H776>no<s%> <S%H3808>name<s%> <S%H8034>abroad.<s%> <S%H6440><s%>
"He is <S%H1920>driven<s%> from <S%H216>light<s%> into <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> And <S%H5074>chased<s%> from the <S%H8398>inhabited<s%> <S%H8398>world.<s%>
"He has <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5209>offspring<s%> or <S%H5220>posterity<s%> among his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H369>Nor<s%> any <S%H8300>survivor<s%> <S%H4033>where<s%> he <S%H4033>sojourned.<s%>
"Those in the <S%H314>west<s%> are <S%H8074>appalled<s%> at his <S%H3117>fate,<s%> And those in the <S%H6931>east<s%> are <S%H270>seized<s%> with <S%H9623>horror.<s%>
<S%H389>"Surely<s%> <S%H428>such<s%> are the <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> of the <S%H5767>wicked,<s%> And <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of him who does not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>"
